$299 per pax for 4D3N stay at Adi Dharma BALI + Daily Breakfast for 4 Pax

goods.highlights:
• Journey to BALI, the Island of the Gods and a internationally renowned tropical paradise for a luxurious 4D3N holiday!
  • Package includes: Half Day City Tour
  • FLIGHT DETAILS
  • SIN - DPS KL 835 : ETD 1730hrs // ETA 2010hrs
  • DPS - SIN KL 836 : ETD 2135hrs // ETA 2359hrs
  • Child Rate CHILD with Bed : S$256 per pax CHILD without Bed : S$225 per pax
  • Extension Rate S$85 per room per night
  • Enjoy the beauty of Bali's natural setting and at night, paint the town red with its vibrant nightlife!
  • Buy multiple vouchers for your family and pals for a memorable group holiday
goods.conditions:
• Redemption/Booking Period : by 14 Feb 2013
  • Travel Period : till 31 Mar 2013
  • Blackout Period : 08 to 12 Feb 2013 // 27 - 31 Mar 2013
  • TO REDEEM, email feryanto@tripuri.com or nazril@tripuri.com stating: - All Travellers' particulars (Name as in Passport, Passport No., Passport Expiry Date, DOB, Nationality, Gender & Contact No.) - Preferred travel dates - Attached StreetDeal PDF voucher
  • Booking must be made at least 3 working days before travel date
  • Buy as many as you like as gifts! 1 voucher is valid for 1 person. Minimum 2 to go.
  • Rooms are based on Twin Sharing only
  • Excludes: ? Singapore Airport Taxes : S$95 ? Indonesia Airport Taxes : IDR150,000
  • Strictly no extension upon expiry
  • Hotel Room is subject to availability. Strictly on a first-come-first-served basis.
  • No amendment or cancellation is allowed once booking has been sent to Travel Agency by email unless the date is fully booked
  • StreetDeal and the Company cannot be held responsible for any expenses, reimbursement or refund of any tour prices if passenger is refused entry by any country on the tour for whatever reasons including lack of necessary visas
  • For enquiries, call 6337 1684
  • When booking is made, the Travel Agent shall assume full responsibility for all coordinations and fulfillments/duties towards the customer
  • Voucher is non-exchangeable, non-refundable, non-extendable, non-transferable and not valid with other existing discounts or promotions
goods.description: Where better to step out of your comfort zone than in BALI, the famed Island of the Gods that is a tropical paradise that draws throngs of holidaymakers and even pilgrims who are seeking to embark on a journey of self-discovery, as popularized by Elizabeth Gilbert's memoir, Eat Pray Love. Adi Dharma has 68 comfortably appointed Superior rooms, 10 Deluxe room, 4 Super deluxe Rooms and 5 family rooms. All Rrooms of Adi Dharma Hotel Legian Bali are with balcony facing to garden or pool with individually selft controlled air - conditioning, refrigerator with mini bar, direct dial telephone, television with 60 international and local chanel, in room digital safety box, hair dryer and hot shower over bath tub. Tea and coffe making facilities are also available in all rooms.
